topic.title: CTiX
topic.body:
Invest from 0.001 BTC with CTix on caounterparty.io. We pay monthly comThe CTIX each owner pays a commission. The commission will be credited in the counterwallet and XCP- was paid out. The extent always depends on how successfully we close the month. The commission is between 1-5 days after the reference month. The degree will be published every month. Everyone is entitled to a commission, a reference to the moment of CTIX has.
Now the possible accession of new crypto asset, CTIX name. Price 1 CTIX= 0.14371987 XCP.
The CTIX like every digital asset or cryptocoin with adequate traffic a chance to offer a larger bills included. If the CTIX not only available to the counter party side, but the biggest bills in, it can greatly increase the price because at the same time thousands of users can take you out of that office. We hope that by that time we did not just investors CTIX was held, so now all the transactions in the market impact is left, as is the case in most coin / asset. Accordingly, it is impossible to guess the price CTIX future, it should be regarded as long-term investments, as appropriate traffic, increasing demand necessary to bring the market price from rising. http://ctx.pe.hu , http://127.0.0.1:43110/1GCGnZgya4dgmAKtxd1VaLfx6eu3JX7hon/?Home
